Tips about where to go out in Islamabad What is a good place to go in Islamabad to learn more about the culture of Islamabad? Is there some kind of cultural centre in Islamabad from where I can really learn the details of Islamabad culture? 1 Add Category: Arts&Culture Islamabad Tags: culture culture centre Do you know where is the most luxurious restaurant in Islamabad? The most expensive restaurants usually have the best quality and service, and I don't mind spending a good amount of money for a great tasting dish. I also always meet the most ... 1 Add Category: Dining Out Islamabad Tags: restaurants luxurious restaurant What is the healthiest restaurant in Islamabad? I prefer to eat healthy meals over meals that simply taste good which is why I am looking for a restaurant in Islamabad that is well-known for providing healthy cuisine. 2 Add Category: Dining Out Islamabad Tags: healthy dining restaurants Where is the best restaurant in Islamabad? I love going to the best restaurants in every city. What is the most popular restaurant overall in Islamabad in terms of good tasting food, service, and cost? 2 Add Category: Dining Out Islamabad Tags: restaurants best restaurant Where is the best place in Islamabad to eat fast food? I love fast food. I don't like to wait for my food. I just like to order and start eating a few minutes after I order. Where is the best fast food restaurant in Islamabad? 1 Add Category: Dining Out Islamabad Tags: restaurants fast food I want to know where is the best place to eat Spanish food in Islamabad? I like Spanish food, especially tapas, so I am searching for the best Spanish restaurant in Islamabad. 2 Add Category: Dining Out Islamabad Tags: restaurants spanish food Where is the best bar in Islamabad to hear live music? I like going to bars which feature live music, and I want to find the best bar in Islamabad where I can hear live music. 0 Add Category: Other Going Out Questions Islamabad Tags: bars live music Do you think you can tell me where is the most affordable nightclub in Islamabad? I like to go to nightclubs very often, but I need to save money when I do it, so I am looking for the most affordable club overall in Islamabad in terms of entrance, food, and ... 0 Add Category: Nightlife Islamabad Tags: nightclub affordable nightclub Where is the most interesting piece of art in Islamabad? What is the most popular art piece in Islamabad? Why is it the most interesting, and where can find it? 0 Add Category: Arts&Culture Islamabad Tags: art arts&culture most interesting What is the best festival for families in Islamabad? Is there a festival in Islamabad which is especially great for families? 0 Add Category: Festivals&Fairs Islamabad Tags: family family festival Adjust your search Search nearby Islamabad + 0 2 5 10 25 km Go!
